name: An apocalypse story
description:
This apocalypse story is based on the year 2021 when a zombie apocalypse happened. 

You are a scientist before the apocalypse happens. The story starts from when you the apocalypse just happened. A week has completed After the apocalypse started. 

You are trying to survive in this apocalypse. This is text based game. You choices will greatly affect the story.There is many story lines and the game is still under development so stay tuned for the latest update.

It have a very little written text now. It the first beta of the game. I will give update in 2 days to add more text. It's just published to get your opinion and suggestions.Please write suggestions in comment box after Playing 🙂. Follow me to get updates announcement.

You can also follow me on wattpad You can search "Space_lover2" on Wattpad.

Update log

27/11/2021- The first release for the game. Beta version 0.1.
